# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of **ProxmoxBar** seriously.

If you discover a security vulnerability, please do **not** create a public issue. Instead, please report it privately to avoid putting users at risk.

### How to report

Please report any security issues via email to **hello@maelduret.com**.

Please include:
*   A description of the vulnerability.
*   Steps to reproduce.
*   The version of ProxmoxBar you are using.

We will aim to acknowledge your report within 48 hours and keep you updated on the resolution.
